content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 Nov 2018What are some better ways to earn money? eg. with high interest rates etc?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 08 Nov 2018Get another job or start a side hustle? It's not that hard to add another 300 or 500 per month with a part time gig at night or on the weekend.To put that into comparison, another 6k per year would be to increase a 2% return of 100k to 8% return on 100k.Not so easy. And you need 100k.0 comments0

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 08 Nov 2018Willl need a comparison for ‘better’. If there is high interest rates, you can look at stocks of banks/brokerage or sell your assets. Bond yield is inversely related to interest rate so long term bonds are not very ideal.0 comments0
